mapper.sql: order_id, user_id,shop_id, actual_price, third_order, pay_status, pey_method, dining_status, remark, create_at, update_at
mapper.select: SELECT cdo.order_id AS orderId, cdo.user_id AS userId, user_account AS userAccount, cdo.shop_id AS shopId, shop_name AS shopName, actual_price as actualPrice, third_order AS thirdOrder, pay_status AS payStatus, pey_method AS peyMethod, dining_status AS diningStatus, cdo.remark as remark, cf.save_path AS savePath, cdo.create_at as createAt, cdo.update_at AS updateAt, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT_WS('X',cd.dish_name,cod.dish_count)) AS content FROM czb_dish_order cdo LEFT JOIN czb_shop cs ON cdo.shop_id = cs.shop_id LEFT JOIN czb_file cf ON cs.shop_img = cf.file_id LEFT JOIN czb_order_dishes cod ON cdo.order_id = cod.order_id LEFT JOIN czb_dish cd ON cod.dish_id = cd.dish_id LEFT JOIN czb_user cu ON cdo.user_id = cu.user_id WHERE cdo.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY cdo.order_id

select order_id AS orderId, cdo.user_id AS userId, user_account AS userAccount, cdo.shop_id AS shopId, shop_name AS shopName, actual_price as actualPrice, third_order AS thirdOrder, pay_status AS payStatus, pey_method AS peyMethod, dining_status AS diningStatus, remark as remark, cdo.create_at as createAt, cdo.update_at AS updateAt FROM czb_dish_order cdo LEFT JOIN czb_shop cs ON cdo.shop_id = cs.shop_id LEFT JOIN czb_user cu ON cdo.user_id = cu.user_id WHERE cdo.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
